title: 20,000 leagues under the sea
brief_description: Walt Disney’s entertaining epic version of Jules Verne’s nautical tale, stars James Mason as the evil, renegade Mastermind, Captain Nemo who pilots the fantastic submarine Nautilus on a memorable, adventure-filled journey beneath the seven seas.
